full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'KHOR LO 'BAR BA'I SGRUB THABS KYI 'DON CHA  SBRAG NAS SGRIGS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,('KHOR LO'I 'BAR BA'I SGRUB THABS KYI 'DON CHA LUGS GNYIS SBRAG NAS SGRIGS PA 'DI NI, DON GYI SLAD DU MTSAN NAS SMOS TE. MKHAN RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DANG DBYER MA MCHIS PA BKA' DRIN MNYAM MED RJE BTZUN 'GRO MGON BSTAN PA'I NYI MA DPAL BZANG POS 'DI LTA BU BSGRIGS SHIG PAR BKA' STZAL BA DANG DANG DU BLANGS TE, DAM PA 'DI NYID KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BIKshU WAKKINTRAS BSGRIGS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,'DIS KYANG DAM PA DE NYID KYI ZHABS PAR RDO RJE LTA BUR BRTAN CING ZHAM 'BRING BA RNAMS KYIS CHOS SPYOD BCU'I MTHUN RKYEN THAMS CAD YID BZHIN DU 'GRUB PAR GYUR CI , ,,)
